subject: RE: [junit] assertTrue in setUp() methode
msgSnippet: The setup() method is basically used for creating the fixtures i.e dependant objects required for testing. Ideally it should be used in tearDown() method. ...
messageBody:
The setup() method is basically used for creating the fixtures i.e dependant objects required for testing. Ideally it should be used in tearDown() method.


-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of
isowitz
Sent: Monday, September 18, 2006 3:00 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] assertTrue in setUp() methode


I have a short question. Is it good to make a assertTrue(), assertEquals
() etc. in the setUp() or tearDown() methode?
